title: Revolution of Gaming - Gaming Community

embed.title: Revolution of Gaming
embed.description: We are a large community that has been around since 2008.

body:
Hey all i'm xsparks from RoG-Revolution of Gaming, a gaming community focused on helping people find others to play with.

we play a range of games on all platforms from Halo, Battlefield, CoD BO2/Advanced warfare, Destiny and of course League of legends we have around 40+ members in our league section he have a few ranked teams as well and people are always looking to join a team.

our forums can be found 
[url]http://rogcommunity.com/forums/forum.php?referrerid=12[/url]

you can apply to our brigades(groups) here
[url]http://rogcommunity.com/forums/application-forms.php?appid=1[/url]

we have several groups in RoG such as our

Media team: Twitch team/YouTube team we also have our own monthly PodCast

Graphics team: we have very skilled GFX members in RoG how can make things from Sigs to Twitch themes to YouTube backgrounds. to have one made you need to be a member and meet a few requirements

Events team: we have an events team that makes game nights and tournaments 

other links for RoG are
Twitch: [url]http://www.twitch.tv/RoGCommunity/url]
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RoG_Community
Facebook: [url]https://www.facebook.com/RevolutionofGaming?fref=ts[/url]


IGN
RoG xsparks

replies.body: bumps. still looking for all who are interested
